pageContext.claim: “The FBI was in complete turmoil (see N.Y. Post) because of Comey’s poor leadership and the way he handled the Clinton mess (not to mention his usurpation of powers from the Justice Department). My firing of James Comey was a great day for America. He was a Crooked Cop.”
pageContext.analysis: Internal surveys acquired by the New York Times show Comey was well liked and respected by the rank and file FBI agents. This finding was re enforced by the testimony of former FBI officials.
